text: Ni [dui tamen] shuo:“Shei cong tiandi jian ci gei nimen jiyang? Shei zhangguan tingjue yu shijue? Shei cong wu shengwu zhong chansheng you shengwu? Shei cong you shengwu zhong chansheng wu shengwu? Shei chuli wanshi?” Tamen jiang shuo:“An la.” Ni [dui tamen] shuo:“Nandao nimen hai bu jingwei [an la] ma?”
